document.full_text: bob marley's battle with cancer ended in a miami hospital 30 years ago on wednesday, bringing to a premature close the life of reggae music's most important standard-bearer.
document.title: bob marley exhibit opens on anniversary of death
lines_and_colors: bob marley's battle with cancer ended in a miami hospital 30 years ago on wednesday, bringing to a premature close the life of reggae music's most important standard-bearer.
